description: This is a shell script containing functions and commands for managing OCI containers, including starting, stopping, listing, and executing commands inside containers, along with CLI interaction logic.

methods.name: start_container_from_bundle
methods.description: Starts a container using an OCI bundle from the specified directory or path.

methods.name: start_container_from_spec
methods.description: Starts a container using a Dobby spec JSON file.

methods.name: stop_container
methods.description: Stops a running container by containerId.

methods.name: get_container_info
methods.description: Retrieves information about a specific container.

methods.name: get_container_state
methods.description: Retrieves current state information of a specific container.

methods.name: execute_command
methods.description: Executes a command inside a container with optional parameters.

methods.name: ocicontainer_help
methods.description: Displays usage instructions and available commands.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main loop handling user input and executing commands accordingly.
